errors.outputs_incompatible: These outputs cannot be grouped together

group_with_output.title: Group with output
group_with_output.hint: Groups this output with another output. If target is already grouped, this device joins that group.

leave_group.title: Leave group
leave_group.hint: Removes this output from its current group. Does nothing if not grouped.

transfer_playback_to.title: Transfer playback to
transfer_playback_to.hint: Moves the current playback queue to another zone or output.
